backgrounds.name: Mechanical Engineer
backgrounds.desc: Language of pistons. You fix things with percussive maintenance.

backgrounds.name: Computer Engineer
backgrounds.desc: OSINT wizard. You see the world as data streams.

backgrounds.name: The Architect
backgrounds.desc: Structure and Beauty. You judge civilizations by their walls.

backgrounds.name: The Doctor
backgrounds.desc: Healer of hardware. Steady hands, zero patience for stupidity.

backgrounds.name: The Historian
backgrounds.desc: Time is your library. You know why they died and what they wore.

backgrounds.name: The Artist
backgrounds.desc: You capture the soul of the timeline. You see colors others ignore.

backgrounds.name: The Popstar
backgrounds.desc: Charisma weaponized. You can start a riot with a microphone.

backgrounds.name: The Actor
backgrounds.desc: Master of disguise. You don't just visit history; you blend in.

backgrounds.name: The Athlete
backgrounds.desc: Peak condition. You run toward explosions while others run away.

backgrounds.name: The Adventurer
backgrounds.desc: Jack of all trades. A map in your head and a multitool in your pocket.

backgrounds.name: The Sailor
backgrounds.desc: Navigator of stars. You know the ocean is scarier than time.
